specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Bonded Bonded fabric is created by fusing two different layers into one, which improves durability. When a winter outer layer is combined with a warm lining, it enhances insulation while also supporting a structured, defined silhouette.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Anti-Microbial Fabric with an antibacterial effect created by inserting silver into yarns or through silver nano coating. Brand Yarn Creora® Creora® is a spandex with high power and excellent heat resistance, which maintains its fabric power even setting at high temperature or re-dyeing. In particular, this offers outstanding deeper color and better fastness, dyed with disperse dye stuff.
